main_topic.author: GODDiao
main_topic.title: Ask on a silly question about the observation
main_topic.content:
I have read the code in llm_20_questions.py. I have noticed that many objects like active, and inactive has not been explained very clearly.

I am wondering where I can see the methods of the objects like obs…

obs.turnType, obs. question etc….

comments.author: Bovard Doerschuk-Tiberi
comments.content: throwing a print(dir(obs)) in and running with debug mode should show you everything in there!
